bacon_description: Our bacon is prepared from several different cuts of meat from the pork belly, delivered from our own pork farms.
salad_description: We use leaves of naturally grown green salads from our own bio farms.
cheese_description: We use Cheddar cheese imported from Switzerland with the highest grade of quality.
meat_description: This sirloin beef comes from our own cattle farms and is dried naturally before use.
